#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int found[100005];
int main()
{
          int i,num;
          cin >> num; 
          for(i=0; i<100005;i++)
          found[i]=-1;
          int demand =0;
          while(num--) {
                       int len;
                       char s[10];
                       scanf("%s %d",&s,&len);
                       if(s[0]=='f') {
                                     found[len]=demand;
                       } else if(found[len]>=0) {
                              demand = max(demand,found[len]+len);
                              found[len]=-1;
                       }
          }
          cout << demand << endl;
          return 0;
}
